Offscreen Magazine

I worked closely with Kai and after many rounds of revisions and tweaking, we arrived at the complete set you see below.

Download City Icons for Offscreen Magazine here.

Pictured in order: New York, San Francisco, Austin, London, Berlin, Stockholm, Barcelona, Paris, Tokyo, Sydney, Dublin, Wellington, Amsterdam, Cape Town.
